title: Implications
plot_threads_advanced: Team extracted 4 complete mathematical proofs in 3 weeks
Proofs solve century-old problems using alien mathematics
Recognition that signal is a pedagogical curriculum, not just message
Team decides to publish via ArXiv in 72 hours
Frame disclosure as inspiring scientific collaboration, not threat

Marcus Reid.state: Leading the disclosure decision, trusting collaborative approach
Marcus Reid.key_moment: Commits to ArXiv publication despite career risks

Sofia Navarro.state: Strategically thinking about disclosure narrative and framing
Sofia Navarro.key_moment: Argues test is about social cohesion, not just intelligence

Yuki Tanaka.state: Has been drafting publication for a week, committed to transparency
Yuki Tanaka.key_moment: Reveals she's already preparing ArXiv paper

knowledge_revealed: Four alien mathematical proofs decoded (including Riemann Hypothesis)
Proofs use methods humanity hasn't developed yet
Signal is pedagogical - teaching alien mathematics systematically
Estimated 20 theorems total, 4 months to decode all
Test may be about global collaboration, not just intelligence
Timeline: 16 months remaining until Voyager arrival

causal_chains.effect: Recognition that aliens are teaching, not just communicating

causal_chains.cause: Need for 50+ specialists to decode in time
causal_chains.effect: Decision to publish openly via ArXiv to enable global collaboration

tension_elements: Fear of panic vs need for collaboration
Aliens testing social cohesion, not just intelligence
Past Kessler's deadline - operating without authorization
world_state_changes: Decision made: publish via ArXiv in 72 hours
Frame as collaborative scientific opportunity, not threat
Timeline: 72 hours until world learns of first contact
